m_szDocTitle: 2016 World Green Car of the Year announced
m_szDocSumamry: 2016 World Green Car of the Year announced Save  |  Email  |  Print  |   PDF       The Toyota Mirai, a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle, has been named 2016 World Green Car at the New York International Auto Show. To be considered for nomination, a vehicle had to be all-new or substantially revised, in production and introduced for sale or lease to the public in quantities of at least 10 in at least one major market during the period beginning 1 January 2015 and ending 31 May 2016.
